body: @thesnake101 it's an ermine, also known as a stoat (source: negima)

I want to know something - what's the animal on top of the shota's head in the cover? I kind of recognize it, but I can't for the life of me put a name on it. Is it a gerbil? I don't know why, but that name just resonates with the animal I'm seeing displayed on the cover, even though I know it isn't one thanks to a quick google search I just did. If someone holds the answer to my question, please comment it on here, I beg of you.
